wikipedia_page.main: Esther Lewis, (1716-1794) was an English poet who published in the fashionable Bath Journal  and occasionally in the Gentleman's Magazine. She is also known by her pen name of Sylvia and her later married name of Esther Clark.

response: * Esther Lewis (1716–1794), poet, was the daughter of Rev John Lewis of Holt. She resided there until 1760.
Esther Lewis (1887 – 4 November 1958), born Esther Evans, was a Welsh educator and Presbyterian missionary in India and Bangladesh.
